meanings.definition: A unit of length equal to one millionth of a meter.
meanings.sent1: Under the microscope, you can measure tiny objects in micrometres.
meanings.sent2: Scientists use micrometres to precisely measure the size of cells.
meanings.sent3: The bacteria were so small, they could fit within a few micrometres!
meanings.sent4: In the world of nanotechnology, a micrometre can feel like a mile.
meanings.sent5: The artist painted intricate details using a brush thinner than a micrometre.
